parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF11240063) at the end. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for campaign finance transparency and are mandated for political advertising.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Alternativa pentru Demnitatea Națională - ADN" and its candidate Costin Movila, specifying their position (12) for the Chamber of Deputies. This directly refers to a parliamentary candidate and party participating in the election, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few.  The use of Facebook as a platform further supports this conclusion. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Costin Movila and ADN. The phrasing "Votam..." (We vote...) directly calls for a specific voting action. This clearly aims to influence the election outcome, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It does not present news, analysis, or opinions; instead, it directly advocates for a specific candidate and party. It does not adhere to journalistic standards of objectivity and impartiality.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct call to action for a specific candidate and party.  The use of the CMF number further reinforces this.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>993705712527586</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It explicitly mentions a candidate and party, targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to choose ADN and Costin Movila. The presence of a CMF number further confirms its nature as electoral propaganda.  The post's timing is also crucial; even if the exact date isn't specified, the context suggests it's likely after the official campaign period, making it a potential violation of Article 98 t) if the campaign period has ended.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Costin Movila</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>FRP TV</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Federatia Romanilor de Pretutindeni, pentru incalcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 a unei reclame electorale pe Facebook (ID postare: 993705712527586) care promoveaza candidatul Costin Movila de la Alternativa pentru Demnitate Nationala (ADN),  cu scopul clar de a influenta votul alegatorilor prin îndemnul direct „Votam Alternativa pentru Demnitatea Națională - ADN , votam Costin Movila”,  precum si prin prezența numărului CMF11240063, specific campaniilor electorale,  constituind astfel propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.  Reclama îndeplinește toate criteriile materialului de propagandă electorală conform art. 36 (7) din Legea nr. 334/2006, adresându-se publicului larg și depășind limitele activității jurnalistice.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
